name: Peace&Love River
description:
"Tell you a secret, I saw the shiny Magikarp when I was a kid playing by the river! Yeah, I do want to tell this story to others, but kinda afraid that no one will believe me. Anyway, I hope you can be as lucky as me."

Starting with $100, make your own strategy to win more!

Thanks for playing:)
